rows.label: qst106009_msg0001
rows.name: Now, let's begin the third period, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0002
rows.name:
The third period is a study of
ancient civilizations, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0003
rows.name:
Just like in the first period,
please read the sentence written
on the blackboard, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0004
rows.name: The first period is Forestry, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0005
rows.name:
Now, Hana-san, please read the sentence
written on the blackboard, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0006
rows.name:
To gain refinement, you also
need strength and skill that
are second to none, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0007
rows.name:
But sadly, the number of young
people who can acquire such skills
is decreasing every year, mo.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0008
rows.name: I wonder how Hana-san will fare, mo?
